channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Russia hasn't reacted to Trump's Greenland takeover bid
item.description: The Kremlin has not commented on Trump's Greenland ambitions, with analysts saying they serve a bigger purpose for Moscow.

item.title: Chinese government to review Meta's acquisition of AI company Manus
Trump's team races to come up with a Greenland takeover plan — here's what's at stake
item.description: U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio says that he intends to convene with Danish officials next week to discuss Greenland.

item.title: This 100-year-old stock-market indicator just flashed a buy signal
Obamacare subsidies extension clears procedural hurdle in the House
item.description: The three-year extension of enhanced Obamacare tax credits is slated for a final vote in the House on Thursday.

item.title: Back on board: Defense stocks are surging after Trump's spending proposal
Trump’s Greenland gambit puts China on edge after Venezuela operation
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's threat to take control of Greenland raised alarms in Beijing as nations vye for the vast mineral reserves in the Arctic ...

item.title: Trump says he will not permit dividends and stock buybacks for defense companies
item.description: Shares of General Dynamics, Lockheed Martin and Northrop Grumman each fell following Trump's comments.

item.title: Goldman Sachs’ Apple Card saga is finally coming to an end
Why Trump's plan to crack down on institutional buyers won't lower home prices
